name: Darkness and Light
description:
Help Soul on its path to the final destination. Explore flying through avenue, mountain range, city lights, and darkness. Experience downfalls and changes, endings and new beginnings, crying and laughter. Solve puzzles and mazes, gather knowledge, fill with love, collect all the keys that open magical doors, and enlighten the soul to ascend.

Requirements:
OS: Windows 8 or higher
Processor: 1.80 GHz Dual Core
Memory: 4 GB
Graphics: In rank of Intel HD 4000, GeForce 620m, GeForce 710, Radeon HD 7550m, Radeon HD 6450
Direct X: 11
Screen resolution: 16:9
